mapper.sql: qpi.pda_inspection_id, qpi.pda_inspection_code, qpi.work_order_id, qpi.package_manager_id, qpi.surveyor_id, qpi.feedback_matters, qpi.documents_time, qpi.documents_type, qpi.status,qpi.create_user_id, bo.organization_name,qpi.create_time,bo.organization_code, qpi.modified_user_id,qpi.modified_time,qpi.is_delete, qpi.organization_id,qpi.remark
mapper.select:
select ,su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name,bo.organization_name, swo.work_order_code,spl.pro_name AS production_line,sys.user_name AS handler_name,mpm.bar_code AS pallet_code from qms_pda_inspection qpi LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON qpi.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON qpi.modified_user_id = sus.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON qpi.organization_id = bo.organization_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_work_order swo ON qpi.work_order_id = swo.work_order_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_pro_line spl ON swo.pro_line_id = spl.pro_line_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sys ON qpi.surveyor_id = sys.user_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.mes_package_manager mpm ON qpi.package_manager_id = mpm.package_manager_id
and qpi.pda_inspection_code like CONCAT('%', #{pdaInspectionCode}, '%')
and spl.pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{productionLine}, '%')
and sys.user_id = #{handler}
and swo.work_order_code like CONCAT('%', #{workOrderCode}, '%')
and date_format(qpi.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by create_time desc
